The photograph of a policeman swinging h: taken by PTI photojournalist Ravi Choudhary, provided visual evidence of the lathi-charge incident.
The video shared by BJP IT cell head Ami: which was made by a pro-BJP propaganda page, attempted to prove that the police action against the farmer did not take place.
The tweet by Congress leader Rahul Gandh: criticizing the Modi government and sharing the photograph, added credibility to the claim.
